examples: She wanted to fly solo across the Atlantic.

meanings.def: without any other musicians; without other musical instruments
examples: After three years with the band he decided to go solo.

meanings.def: done by one person alone, without anyone helping them
connected with or played as a musical solo
examples: a solo artist (= for example a singer who sings on their own, not as part of a group)
She went on to record a solo album after the band split up.

meanings.def: a piece of music, dance or entertainment performed by only one person
examples: The song features an extended guitar solo.
She sang a solo at the school concert.

meanings.def: a flight in which the pilot flies alone without an instructor (= teacher)
